name: You Only Get One Shot (Alexander Shen)
name_original: You Only Get One Shot (Alexander Shen)
description:
You only get one shot, do not miss your chance to blow. Spaghetti.

HOW TO PLAY

Press "N" to setup the dungeon with enemies roaming around. You get a single shot to ricochet off walls and biggie enemies in hopes of destroying as many as possible. Every time your bullet hits a wall it loses integrity (i.e. health) until it explodes (which means game over). Use the spacebar to slow down the bullet. 

Thanks for playing!

TIPS & TRICKS

  • The bullet will bounce off big baddies, but not decrease health.
  • For every 10 enemies felled a Heart appears.
  • The Heart gives you +5 health.
  • The game will GTFO your bullet if the bullet bounces 0/90/180/270 degrees too often (e.g. you shoot directly horizontal).
  • The big baddies have 3 health before exploding. They are worth more points though.

SOURCE CODE

If you pay/donate $5.00 you get the Game Maker source! You can do whatever you want with it. Have fun!
